description: "A series of graphs and drawings about the 1883 eruption of the Krakatoa volcano. Includes elevation views from 1849 and 1880, a globe showing where the eruption was heard, a sketch of the crater of one of the cones, and a cross-section of a volcano."
title: "[Grafieken en tekeningen betreffende de uitbarsting van de Krakatau in 1883]"
